comentarios.p_comentario: I went to this restaurants with some family members as well as with a couple friends, and I was amazed by the kindness of the staff, the warm welcome and the spectacular quality of the food we had. Overall there were zero complaints among all...of us and Gaby (the owner) was the sweetest host. I would 100% recommend this to anyone who likes good food and is near by. Also font forget to try their signature dessert, you will be blown away.More

We had a great time at this place. It's very rustic and welcoming. All the products they use to prepare their food are gotten from their own farm (which you can go and explore if you want).

The food was nothing but delicious. I seriously...haven't found a restaurant so focused on quality, flavor and presentation in a long time. They won't serve you the traditional Ecuadorian food here, but they will amaze you with their original recipes that use the traditional Ecuadorian ingredients. I loved the lamb, the urtica soup (yes, it was surprisingly delicious) and the best chocolate mousse I've ever had in my life (that was served with a bit of toasted chochos).

We had also the chance to meet the chef and his wife that are the owners of the place and they were kind enough to tell us about the land, what they do, how they got there and their vision for the place. They were very friendly and I'm sure they'll be very successful if they keep doing that amazing job. 

I recommend this place to everybody as it's a hidden gem in Tungurahua.More
